name: Dungeon Inception
description:
Get immersed in this world of randomly generated dungeons, each round is never the same, fight for your life against enemies, collect gold and items that will help you on your path...

At this moment the game is in very early stage of the development, and it may feel a bit empty and full of bugs...

What you can do so far:

  • Play for hours trying not to get kill by enemies (3 enemies only for now)
  • Collect gold and a couple of items (only two items for now)

What you can not do yet:

  • Spend the gold you earn
  • Upgrade the character's attributes

Upcoming in future updates:

  • More characters
  • More Items
  • More enemies
  • A purchasing system and upgrade system
  • Any ideas that flow along the way

If you download and play this "game", you are a really cool person :)
